definition: a means of serving, to use to one's advantage
details:
noun
- a means of serving
= example: a means of serving
= synonyms: service
verb
- to use to one's advantage
= example: to use to one's advantage
= synonyms: play
- to take or use
= example: to take or use
= synonyms: help
- to be of use to, be useful to
= example: to be of use to, be useful to
